findings.rationale: An indefinite term may pose a risk as it could lead to perpetual obligations and liabilities for the Receiving Party without clear time limits.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The broad definition may lead to ambiguity regarding what information is protected, potentially resulting in disputes or unintentional violations.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.

findings.rationale: The absence of limitations on liability can expose the Receiving Party to significant financial risks in case of a breach.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party agrees to hold and maintain the Confidential Information in strict confidence.
